entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Doaktown
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:11 PM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.9°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening and ending before morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 23 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 23 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 36 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 36 in the evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 February 2023
